about_the_game:
Dive into an graphic novel inspired ultra-violent escape mission - to survive the underworld and blast your way through ravaging mutant hordes before they feed their thirst for blood and death. Explore lost ancient ruins and hack your way through the underworld army using the power of awesome long lost weapons and your own grit and will to survive!




From captive to stone-cold-killer - brave the underworld labyrinth and wipe the mutant scum from the pages of existence. Their evil creator bred an army of cannibals, zombies and half-humans wit the sole aim of the destruction of human civilisation. YOU were caught, experimented on, and injected with mutant blood. It's not good s**t.




Wield a variety of weapons, from classic double-barrel shotguns to experimental plasma rifles, and charge head-first into the fast-paced demon-slaying action. Running out of ammo? Grab the trust fire-axe and aim for the skull. There are plenty of ways to cut your way trhough the demon army and your might even find some hidden (yet lethal) gems.




Immerse yourself in graphic-novel inspired visuals and ultra-violence. Watch your enemies explode in bright technicolor in a black and white underworld to the tunes of a bone-shaking soundtrack, highlighted only by the cocking of your trusty Smith 'n' Wesson revolver and the blast of buckshot into a charging demon's gut.




Survival and escape depends on your gun-skills and how you use the tools you find to your advantage. Do you favour a head-on charge or a piercing attack on the flank? Do you want to get up close and personal with a blade or do you like to explode skulls from a distance? The choice is yours!

If you've read this far and you're interested in playing our demo and game first, hit the wishlist button now!

name: Meat Gone Wrong

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 965 / Intel Core i3-2120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon HD 7770 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500X / Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 580 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Grab your fire-axe and smash your way out of this fast-paced shooter, ultra-violent graphic-novel inspired underworld where raging mutants, marauding mechs and menacing monsters prowl the darkness ready to tear you limb from limb!
